entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
